headline: A Fresh Look at Campbell’s (CPB) Valuation After Earnings Beat and Premium Brand Momentum
summary: If you’ve been wondering what’s next for Campbell's (CPB), you’re not alone. Shares jumped nearly 5% after the company’s latest earnings delivered a clear surprise: profits came in above expectations, thanks in part to more consumers cooking at home and a winning streak for its Meals & Beverages lineup. Rao’s, the premium brand Campbell’s acquired, is closing in on a $1 billion annual sales milestone. This signals that their push for premiumization is starting to pay off. While sales didn’t...
